data.message: you really need to bring back the 'subscribe' and 'unsubscribe' options that you had a few weeks back for only like a week!!! i hate 'liking' someones status or commenting and then contantly having all those stupid notifications of everyone else that 'likes' or 'comments' on the same thing. sometimes I could care less, and really liked having the 'subscribe' or 'unsubscribe' option!!! you should really birng that back!!!!!!!!
